feed.title: Many Notes Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Many Notes: v0.3.2
New release for Many Notes: v0.4.0
entry.content:
Features - OAuth: Now supporting authentication via Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn, Google, GitHub, GitLab, Bitbucket, and Slack - Vaults in file system: A complete copy of all Vaults is now saved on the file system in addition to the database

Other - The instructions now recommend using SQLite and bind mounts instead of MariaDB and Docker volumes - Vault names and file names now support accents and require an alphanumeric character or an underscore as the first character

entry.title: New release for Many Notes: v0.4.1
New release for Many Notes: v0.4.2
entry.content:
• Add Authentik and Keycloak OAuth providers
  • Fix OAuth logins updating user data
  • Update the OAuth redirect variable name to ensure consistency
  • Updated all dependencies

entry.title: New release for Many Notes: v0.5.0
entry.content:
Features:

  • Add Authelia and Zitadel OAuth provider
  • Fix Keycloak OAuth provider
  • Read OAuth configurations from cache
  • Tree view panel now opens by default, except on mobile devices
  • Vaults are now sorted by their last opening date

Other:

  • Fix vault export when zip file could not be created
  • Fix Markdown editor issue when parsing selections in the last line
  • Fix rendering issue of file menu when in preview mode
  • Fix issue when opening a file after closing a file in preview mode
  • Improve overall codebase with Rector, Laravel Pint, PHPStan and PHP_CodeSniffer
  • Add architecture, feature and unit tests
  • Add GitHub tests workflow
  • Update all dependencies
  • Improve features, installation, customization and upgrading sections
